title: The Scout (1994) [Brendan Fraser comedy] (DVDrip,Eng+Subs)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111094/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111094/</a>

With Albert Brooks and Dianne Wiest.

Optional English subtitles in separate idx/sub files.

Hilarious comedy where Brendan Fraser is living in Mexico for some obscure reasons, and is discovered as the world's greatest baseball player. A talent scout brings him back to the Yankee Stadium in New York. But is he... mentally stable?

"The best comedy-fantasy about baseball ever made." Richard Schickel, TIME.

Widescreen 704x368, 2-pass, great stereo AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
